   |   Krit Karan Singh    |

   |    Code Chef          |
    -----------------------
 */

struct ex
 {
   int i  ;
   float j ;
   char *s ;
 };

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
int main()
{
  struct ex *p;
  p=(struct ex*)malloc (sizeof(struct ex));
  p->s=(char*)malloc(20);
  free(p);
  printf("Executed\n");
  return 0;
}
